skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: As a MERN stack developer, I build dynamic and responsive UIs using React, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I focus on creating seamless and visually appealing web applications. My goal is to enhance user experiences through modern design and efficient coding practices.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: I design and manage server-side logic with Node.js and Express. I handle data storage using MongoDB, ensuring efficient and scalable backend solutions. My focus is on building robust APIs and maintaining smooth integration with front-end components.

skills.title: Full Stack Developer
skills.description: I am a full stack developer skilled in building end-to-end web applications using modern technologies like the MERN stack and Appwrite. With experience in front-end and back-end development, I create dynamic, scalable, and user-friendly solutions.

skills.title: Webflow Development
skills.description: I leverage Webflow to create responsive and visually striking websites with a focus on user experience and performance. My expertise includes designing layouts, interactions, and animations while ensuring smooth cross-browser compatibility.

portfolio.title: SnapGram
portfolio.description: Developed a full-stack social media app using React.js, Node.js, Tailwind CSS, and Appwrite. The app features user authentication, post creation and editing, post interaction (like, save, and explore), as well as user profile management. The clean UI and seamless user experience make it easy to connect and share content.

portfolio.title: ChitChat
portfolio.description: Built a real-time chat application using the MERN stack and Socket.io, featuring responsive user authentication and seamless messaging capabilities. The app allows users to engage in real-time conversations with a smooth and interactive interface, ensuring fast and reliable communication.

portfolio.title: YouTube Channel Sponsorship Website
portfolio.description: I developed a personal website for a client with a YouTube channel, enabling seamless contact for sponsorship and promotion inquiries. Built using React and EmailJS, the website includes a 'Get Sponsor' page and dynamically fetches YouTube videos, providing visitors with an easy way to explore the client's content and access their YouTube channel.

portfolio.title: Admin Dashboard
portfolio.description: A fully responsive admin dashboard built using React, Refine, and Ant Design (AntD). It features profile creation and editing, company management, scheduled tasks, and secure authentication (login, logout). Additionally, the dashboard includes a Kanban board for task tracking, upcoming events, and a feed of the latest activities, providing a comprehensive and user-friendly interface for enterprise management.
